name: Even the Odds (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Activate this Skill only if your opponent controls exactly 3 cards and you control no cards.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
During your Main Phase, you can add 1 card from your Deck to your hand, then place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
